Dark Wolf:


Dark Wolf's scanners detected weaponsfire from three bots coming towards him, 
and he rolled through the air, having greater maneuverability than most 
gestalts because he was only 25 ft tall.  He raised an arm, firing off a 
black orb, prematurely blowing it up and interceptin all but three missiles 
which connected.

The Vok gestalt shook violently as missiles tore into his thick armor and 
small, small streams of mech-fluid began leaking and dripping towards the 
ground.  Dark Wolf's ascent was slowed down, but he was still going as fast 
as he could.
